description.0: A longsword used by the Wolf Knight. Originally just a heavy sheet of iron given to the knight by a blacksmith from the city, it became endowed with legendary power owing to his friendship with the wolves.

0.0: Increases ATK by <cryo>20%</cryo>. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by <cryo>40%</cryo> for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

1.0: Increases ATK by <cryo>25%</cryo>. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by <cryo>50%</cryo> for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

2.0: Increases ATK by <cryo>30%</cryo>. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by <cryo>60%</cryo> for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

3.0: Increases ATK by <cryo>35%</cryo>. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by <cryo>70%</cryo> for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.

4.0: Increases ATK by <cryo>40%</cryo>. On hit, attacks against opponents with less than 30% HP increase all party members' ATK by <cryo>80%</cryo> for 12s. Can only occur once every 30s.
